abstract: Apple surpassed Exxon Mobil as the stock markets’ most valuable company, although Exxon finished the day in the lead.
snippet: Apple surpassed Exxon Mobil as the stock markets’ most valuable company, although Exxon finished the day in the lead.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — For several hours on Tuesday, Apple surpassed Exxon Mobil, the energy company, as the stock market’s most valuable company.

headline.main: Briefly, Apple Reigns as the Most Valuable Company
headline.print_headline: Briefly, Apple Reigns as the Biggest Company
